content.text:
# Draft:MT-KINGSS

MT-KINGSS (born 4 November 2001) is a Cambodian hip-hop and rap artist based in Phnom Penh. He is known for his melodic rap style and bilingual lyrics, blending Khmer and English in his music. MT-KINGSS gained recognition through digital platforms such as YouTube, Facebook, and TikTok, attracting a growing fanbase in Cambodia and internationally.
Early life
MT-KINGSS was born on 4 November 2001 in Cambodia. From a young age, he developed an interest in music, especially hip-hop and R&B. He later began writing and recording songs, drawing influence from both Western and Khmer musical styles. He is currently based in Phnom Penh, where he continues to develop his music career.
Career
MT-KINGSS began his music career by independently releasing songs online. He developed a reputation within the Cambodian music scene through his emotional melodies, storytelling lyrics, and catchy hooks. His debut album, Star Boi (2024), includes tracks such as "Angel", "Lovely Boi", "Attractive Boi", and "សង្សារ" (Sangsa).
One of his notable singles, "មួយនាទី" (One Minute), was produced by Taigen and recorded at HYPE STUDIO, with mixing and mastering by D-EMOND KING. MT-KINGSS frequently collaborates with local producers and artists, blending Western hip-hop influences with traditional Cambodian music themes.
Musical style and influences
MT-KINGSS’s music style incorporates elements of hip-hop, rap, and R&B. His lyrics often explore themes of love, heartbreak, and personal expression, and he performs bilingually in Khmer and English.
Discography
Albums
* Star Boi (2024)
Singles
* "Angel" (2024)
* "Lovely Boi" (2024)
* "Attractive Boi" (2024)
* "មួយនាទី" (One Minute) (2024)
* "សង្សារ" (Sangsa) (2024)
Online presence
MT-KINGSS maintains an active presence on social media and music streaming platforms, including:
* [https://www.youtube.com/@mtkingss YouTube]
* [https://www.tiktok.com/@mtkingss TikTok]
* Spotify, Apple Music, and SoundCloud (official artist profiles)
References
* [https://www.youtube.com/@mtkingss MT-KINGSS YouTube Channel]
* [https://www.tiktok.com/@mtkingss MT-KINGSS on TikTok]
